 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָהַט‎</span>] **verb** ==blaze up, flame== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***la±âtu***</u></abbr>, in derived forms); — 

**Qal** ***Participle active*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵשׁ לֹהֵט‎</span> [[Ps.104.4|Ps 104:4]] a ***flaming fire*** (so [[BDB#Bae|Bae]]; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵשׁ וָלַהַט‎</span> [[BDB#Bi|Bi]] [[BDB#Che|Che]], compare [[BDB#Ol|Ol]]), made into <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>'s servants; plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֹהֲטִים‎</span> [[Ps.57.5|Ps 57:5]] (figurative of enemies, compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְבָאִם‎</span> v<sup>a</sup>). **Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְלִהַט‎</span> [[Mal.3.19|Mal 3:19]] 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִהֲטָה‎</span> [[Joel.1.19|Joel 1:19]] ***Imperfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּלַהֵט‎</span> [[Joel.2.3|Joel 2:3]] + 4 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתְּלַהֵט‎</span> [[Deut.32.22|Deut 32:22]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתְּלַהֲטֵהוּ‎</span> [[Isa.42.25|Isa 42:25]] — ***set ablaze***, usually with accusative; — foundation of mountains, [[Deut.32.22|Deut 32:22]] (subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵשׁ‎</span> figurative, of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>'s judgement, \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָדַח‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָקַד‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָכַל‎</span>), compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָרִים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּל‎</span> [[Ps.83.15|Ps 83:15]] (in simile, subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֶהָבָה‎</span>; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּאֵשׁ תִּבְעַריָֿ֑עַר‎</span>; of flame (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֶהָבָה‎</span>); consuming trees [[Joel.1.19|Joel 1:19]] ( of effects of drought; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵשׁ אָֽכְלָה‎</span>); persons [[Mal.3.19|Mal 3:19]] (subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַיּוֺם הַבָּא‎</span> \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּעַר‎</span>); compare [[Ps.97.3|Ps 97:3]] (subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵשׁ‎</span>), [[Ps.106.18|Ps 106:18]] (subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֶהָבָה‎</span> \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתִּבְעַרֿ אֵשׁ‎</span>; hyperb of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>'s wrath (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַפּוֺ וֱעֶזוּז מִלְחָמָה חֵמָה‎</span>) consuming Jacob [[Isa.42.25|Isa 42:25]] of crocodile (hyperb.), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַפְשׁוֺ גֶּחָלִים תְלַהֵ֑ט‎</span> [[Job.41.13|Job 41:13]] ***his breath setteth coals ablaze***; absolute [[Joel.2.3|Joel 2:3]], figurative of devastation by locusts (subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֶהָבָה‎</span>; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָֽכְלָה אֵשׁ‎</span>).
